content: Is the scanner software 32 or 64 bit? If it's 32 bit, TB must be 32 bit for the auto attach to work. TB defaults to 64 bit on 64 bit Windows, although 32 bit TB works fine.
creator: sfhowes

content: Thanks for your reply , I've been using TB with these scanners for some years and the problem only developed some months ago and all 4 Win 10 systems failed to work, no all 4 say theres no TB associated with the scanner to send email to TB, TB currently is 128.2.3esr (32 Bit), I dont know whether the scanner software is 32 or 64bit, how / where can you find out .............. I cant see anywhere on the MP Navigator EX 2.0 about how many bits it is .......
creator: keith72

content: Lo spazio di archiviazione di cosa? Thunderbird non ha limiti di spazio, se non quelli del disco su cui si trova il profilo. Ti riferisci a questo? Se invece parli dello spazio della tua casella email, devi chiedere al tuo fornitore.

content: Is there a trashcan icon on top row of rightclick menu?
creator: davidsk

content: This is because IMAP always keeps all messages on the server until deleted. The messages on your PC are just copies, but the 'real' message is online. This allows you to have full access to mail from multiple PCs or phone.
creator: davidsk
